### Data description
The variables in the data X are sensor signals measured with waist-mounted smartphone from 30 subjects. The variable in the data Y indicates activity type the subjects performed during recording.

### CODE ACTIONS
1. it reads the training and the testing sets
2. it merges the x set, y set and the subject sets
3. it extracts the mean and the standard deviations only
4. it assigns nanmes to the acivities factors
5. it assigns names to the variables in the dataset
6. it takes mean of each activity in each variable after grouping the dataset by the activity and subjects
